meta.description: Optimize the total cost for SupplyChainMax to establish distribution centers and transport goods to meet the demands of retail stores.

params.name: opening_cost
params.description: Opening costs for each distribution center.

params.name: transportation_cost
params.description: Transportation cost per unit from each distribution center to each retail store.

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand of each retail store in units.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Supply capacity of each distribution center in units.

vars.name: open
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a distribution center is opened.

vars.name: ship
vars.description: Units shipped from a distribution center to a retail store.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(open[i] * opening_cost[i] for i in DISTRIBUTION_CENTERS) + sum(ship[i][j] * transportation_cost[i][j] for i in DISTRIBUTION_CENTERS for j in RETAIL_STORES)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of opening distribution centers and transporting goods to retail stores.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_1
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 1 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_2
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 2 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_3
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 3 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_4
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 4 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_5
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 5 is met.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_1
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 1 do not exceed its capacity if opened.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_2
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 2 do not exceed its capacity if opened.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_3
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 3 do not exceed its capacity if opened.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_4
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 4 do not exceed its capacity if opened.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_5
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 5 do not exceed its capacity if opened.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_6
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 6 do not exceed its capacity if opened.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_7
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 7 do not exceed its capacity if opened.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_8
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 8 do not exceed its capacity if opened.
